title: Alpe D’Huez Ending at Tour de France Femmes ‘Gives Opportunities Women Haven’t Had’
content:
'It's something I dreamed of for a long time': peloton looks ahead to finish on legendary climb; having stage winner’s name on hairpin bend is ‘hyper-important’ says race director Rousse.

Read the full article at Alpe D’Huez Ending at Tour de France Femmes ‘Gives Opportunities Women Haven’t Had’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
